value:
$WmMPID_双界ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_MM_Pair,Face|Lilina! There you are.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Wedding22,Face|Oh! Hello, Roy. And hello to you as
well, Uncle!$k$p$WmMPID_エリウッド,ch02_00_Roy_MM_Pair,Face|You look radiant in that outfit, Lilina.
I couldn't be more proud, and I'm
sure Hector feels the same way.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Wedding22,Face|Oh, Uncle, please... At this rate I'll
be too embarrassed to ask...$k$p$WmMPID_双界ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_MM_Pair,Face|Ask what?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Wedding22,Face|Well, if I win, will you... Erm...$k$pActually, we should focus on the
upcoming battle. Just forget I said
anything, OK?$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_花嫁リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Wedding22,Face|I'm going to search for the bouquet
over there, but let's talk later, Roy!$k$p$WmMPID_双界ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_MM_Pair,Face|Oh, uh... Right! Hmm... What's gotten
into her lately? I hope everything is
all right...$k$p$Sbs150|
